Headline: #29 StateTemporary Northbound Reroute near Illinois/Rush
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to,street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound # 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to,street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

Southbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 93rd/Dobson
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted WB: via 95th between Woodlawn and Cottage ; EB via 95th between Cottage  and Woodlawn, due to, street blockage near 93rd/Dobson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Dobson due to street blockage near 93rd/Dobson.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th between Woodlawn and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets..

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th between Cottage Grove and Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/ King Drive
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses rerouted EB via 79th, State, 76th, Cottage Grove & 79th; WB via 79th, Cottage Grv, 83rd, State & 79th due to street blockage near 79th/ King Drive

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions in both directions due to street blockage near 79th/ King Drive.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, State, 76th, Cottage Grove & 79th
  • Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, State & 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
